title: Spain Morocco and Portugal
inclusions_evidence: 15-nights accommodation in cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted
Breakfast daily and up to half of your evening meals
Transport by luxury air-conditioned coach with Wi-Fi in most countries or alternative transportation
Return ferry crossings between Spain and Morocco
Services of an expert Travel Director and professional Driver
All hotel tips, charges and local taxes

other.notes: DIY costs for meals, transport, and services are not provided.

reasoning: The deal offers extensive inclusions for a long tour, but lacks specific DIY pricing for hotels and meals, making it difficult to assess true savings.
additional_notes: Flights are not included, which may add significant cost depending on the route.
